name: Rocket Adventure (Scary Duck)
description:
This was our first Game. We had so much fun and get good experiences This game is about a crew try to get other point but their fuel section is pierced. I hope you fun 

Developers;

Art = Sarp Erden https://itch.io/profile/srprdn

Level Designing/Programing = Ömer Faruk Aytepe https://itch.io/profile/scary-duck

Controls;

Thrust Engine = W

Movement = A and D

Tips;

 if your rocket crashs somewhere it will become hard to control.

You can press retry anytime.

Watch Your Fuel Bar.

I HOPE YOU ENJOY

How to setup game

1- Extract Rocket-Adventure.rar

2-Open the folder

3-Click Rocket-Game.exe

if Rocket--Adventure.rar doesn't work

try to dowland Adventure.rar.Type2 or Type3 it will solve your problem
